item.title: Version 1.5.0
item.description:
üöÄ What's New in 1.5.0

üìÖ Academic & Weekly Planning

  • Real-time Coverage: Weekly planning coverage now updates instantly as you add, remove, or review topics, displaying exact "out of" counts for Topics and SLOs.
  • Global Uniqueness Checks: The system now automatically prevents assigning the same syllabus topic across different weeks in the same academic year.
  • Syllabus Insights: The Syllabus dashboard now calculates and prominently displays the "Total Pages" for the configured subject.
  • Quick Add Shortcuts: Clicking directly on a Chapter or Topic node now instantly opens the creation sheet for its child elements.
  • Enhanced Reporting: Delivery review reports now include a "Missed Topics" section, providing a clearer picture of curriculum gaps.

üìä Reporting & History

  • Missed Topics Details: Delivery review text reports (clipboard exports) now explicitly list "Missed Topics" along with the teacher's provided reasons.

‚ú® UI / UX Enhancements

  • Enhanced Tree Views: Added "Table of Contents" dotted leader lines and interactive row-hover highlighting to make reading complex syllabi and hierarchies much easier.
  • Searchable Dropdowns: Class and Subject selection menus now support deep filtering, making large datasets easier to navigate.
  • Polished Dialogs: Upgraded the Academic Period selector with improved spacing, far-right active status badges, and cleaner selection indicators.
  • Reliable Feedback: Fixed an issue where system Snackbars (success/error messages) were occasionally hidden behind pop-up editor sheets.
  • Syllabus Overhaul: The syllabus screen has been redesigned with a "table of contents" style, using leader lines and hover highlighting to make it easier to connect topics to their page numbers.
  • Faster Workflow: You can now click directly on a Chapter or Topic in the syllabus to quickly open the "Add" sheet for the next level down.

üõ†Ô∏è Bug Fixes & Performance

  • Fixed an issue where deleting an item from the weekly plan did not update the UI until the screen was reloaded.
  • Resolved a bug where feedback messages (snackbars) could appear behind editor sheets.
  • Optimized database queries for analytics to be more efficient and reactive.
